usage.cn: 只有夜色足够黑的时候，才能看得见星星满天。
usage.eng: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.

usage.cn: 即使在最黑暗的日子里，也能寻到幸福。 - Albus Dumbledore
usage.eng: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times.

usage.cn: 我们都行走于黑暗之中，要学会去点亮自己的灯火。
usage.eng: We all walk in the dark and each of us must learn to turn on his or her own light.

usage.cn: 在这个世上不要过分依赖任何人，因为即使是你的影子都会在某些时候离开你。
usage.eng: Never be dependent anyone in this world . Because even your shadow leaves you when you're in the dark.
